parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate. It focuses on showcasing images of brown bears in their natural habitat, promoting awareness of wildlife conservation and the work of Romsilva.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content is designed to reach a broad audience, not just specific individuals.  The use of hashtags further suggests an intention to reach a wider audience interested in nature and conservation.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections.  The content is purely informational and educational, focusing on environmental conservation and the work of Romsilva. There is no mention of any political party, candidate, or electoral platform.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of public awareness campaign, similar to citizen journalism, aiming to educate the public about wildlife conservation and the role of Romsilva in protecting Romania's forests. It presents factual information and promotes responsible behavior towards nature.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the parliamentary elections or any political matters.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>535515275915150</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post by Regia Nationala a Padurilor - Romsilva is a paid advertisement showcasing images of brown bears.  The content is focused on environmental conservation and does not mention any political parties, candidates, or electoral platforms. The post's objective is to raise awareness about wildlife and Romsilva's work, not to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections.  Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Romsilva</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
